title: Australian Defence Scientific Service: 1968 film report
brief_description: The Australian Defence Scientific Service of the Department of Supply carries out an extensive programme of research into a variety of scientific disciplines. Work currently being carried out is an investigation of the laser, and its applications and the development of new techniques in the manufacture of micro-circuit systems. Gives a brief account of the present state of research in these fields. No other credits available.
